text.intro_hello: Hello! We are investigating object recognition and we invite you to take part in this simple experiment.
text.intro_laptop: Please, use a laptop or computer.
text.intro_time: You will need approximately 8 minutes. Also, we kindly ask you to concentrate fully. We promise to make it enjoyable!
text.thankyou_text: Thank you very much for your participation! We are really happy you can spend some time contributing to our studies. Before we get started, we would like to ask you a few questions.
text.questions_blank: Please fill the field before continuing
text.questions_email_info: We need your e-mail address only to make sure you participated once. You will not receive any spam from us - we promise!
text.questions_blind: Do you have any color vision impairments?
text.instructions_title: Here are some instructions. Read them carefully.
text.instructions_1_text1: Make sure your screen is on maximum brightness.
text.instructions_2_title: Two words will appear for 2.5 seconds:
text.instructions_2_text1: One on the left and one on the right.
text.instructions_3_title: After 2.5 seconds, you will see an image.
text.instructions_3_text1: Press Q if the left word corresponds to the image.
text.instructions_3_text2: Press P if the right word corresponds to the image.
text.instructions_4_text1: You will see 96 images. But it will be quick!
text.instructions_4_text2: After you click START you will have 10 seconds to get ready.
text.get_ready: Get readyâ€¦ Position your fingers over the letters Q and P.
text.results_title: You're done! Thank you so much.
text.results_text1: You identified [[ACCURACY]] objects correctly and your average object recognition speed was [[SPEED]].
text.results_text2: You recognized colored images [[COMPARISON]] than achromatic images.
text.results_contact: If you'd like to know more about our research and results, contact us:
